summary: Defines a LinearFunction class that represents a linear reversible quantum operation on a set of qubits using a binary matrix. It handles conversion between circuit, Clifford, and permutation forms and synthesizes the operation into an optimal sequence of CNOT and SWAP gates via the Patel‑Markov‑Hayes algorithm.
business_intent: Enable quantum developers to efficiently model, analyze, and compile linear reversible functions into minimal CNOT/SWAP gate networks, facilitating optimized quantum circuit construction and resource reduction.
